mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM (SELECT c.catename , e.* FROM event_notice e, en_cate c WHERE e.category = c.num AND e.content LIKE #{content} AND e.category LIKE #{category} ORDER BY e.write_date DESC) t) t2 WHERE #{startNum} <= rnum AND rnum <= #{endNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM event_notice WHERE content LIKE #{content} AND category LIKE #{category}
mapper.update: UPDATE event_notice SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT max(idx) FROM event_notice WHERE idx < #{idx}
SELECT min(idx) FROM event_notice WHERE idx > #{idx}
